TopicTitle: how do you get rid of mods that scatter and you cant find all the files to get rid of them

Articles.Content: why do some mods like to scatter around and now i have this mod stuck in my game and it make's things disappear when there detached

There's a help section for modded games... you should put your post/question in there.
https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/forum/70-technical-support-pc-modded-installs/

 

Me personally, I know of no mods which scatter their files around, they stay neatly in their install folders. Perhaps you're dragging them around by mistake?
